title: VW Splitscreen 1966 13 window Deluxe FOR SALE

posts.content:
1966 Splitscreen 13 window deluxe, Due to personal circumstances changing reluctant sale required. Certificate of title and Import papers present.

Parts/Panels Replaced:

OE Bulkhead.
Jacking out riggers/point Front and rear (Both sides).
Front "Top Hat" cross member.
"A" posts both sides.
Inner and outer sills (both sides).
Lower "B "posts (both sides).
"C" and "D" posts.
Lower inner and outer cargo door repair panels (both doors).
Rear wheel arches front and rear closing panels (both sides).
Complete rear quarter panel (short side).
Rear outer wheel arch (Long side).
Engine bay side panels.
Battery tray (Both sides).
Engine bay triangle gussets.
Engine bay Door and hinges.
Rear valance.
Rear quarter lower sections (both sides)
Long side outer sill (300mm)
Front inner valance and outer brackets.

Work still required:

Cargo floor.
Cab floor.
Front wheel arches ( LHS arch supplied ).
Front lower outer valance ( Panel supplied).
Front panel lower repair ( Panel supplied).

Other parts included, both cab doors and tailgate (good condition), all glass and frames, gearbox and running gear and steering box/column.

Â£10,000 Any enquires andyjdutton72@gmail.com or 07865308240
